name: dhen padilla

projects.title: nft gallery
projects.description: a collection of photographs by dhen - minted as nfts. available to buy via celo. built with next.js, thegraph, hardhat and solidity

projects.title: rendezvous
projects.description: a location sharing application - in progress

projects.title: tomoni
projects.description: a decentralised method for concrete stakeholder input in construction projects. the product of my masters thesis

projects.title: ksquad
projects.description: a hierarchical nlp model using roberta & albert created to answer gcse biology questions based on the squad question and answer dataset built within a colaboratory notebook, using pytorch transformers and pre-trained albert model (on squad dataset) including a hierarchy of new sequence classifiers, trained on our novel biology dataset

projects.title: delamp
projects.description: a decentralised legal agreement marketplace protocol. simultaneously creates a legal paper contract whilst deploying a smart contract. built during the ethberlinzwei hackathon and winner of 2 tracks

projects.title: alice
projects.description: a decentralised donations platform promoting transparency and accountability in the philantrophy sector.

services.title: Art Direction
services.description: We help with the creation and development of online advertising ideas, with particular focus on their visual appearance.

services.title: Branding
services.description: We design key brand elements such as the logo, color scheme, typography, and other design components that makes your brand stand out from competitors.

services.title: Web Design
services.description: We build and optimize your online presence.  Website is the digital entry point into your business and a powerful revenue channel.

services.title: 3D Design
services.description: We combine creative design and technical skills to build striking 3D visualisations that bring your project to life.

aboutpara:
a full-stack software engineer with 3 years of experience. 
currently at provenance, previously at arm. driven to create social change and determined to impact the world in a positive way.

education.universityPara: master of engineering, computer science - first class honours
